feature.name: camel-catalog
feature.details: camel-catalog requires the shell feature to be installed

feature.name: camel-avro
feature.details: The camel-avro feature can only run if you have libsnappyjava.dylib in java.library.path

feature.name: camel-cdi
feature.details: camel-cdi requires that either pax-cdi-weld or pax-cdi-openwebbeans has been installed

feature.name: camel-cometd
feature.details: camel-cometd currently requires jetty 9

feature.name: camel-disruptor
feature.details: The camel-disruptor feature can only run on a SUN JVM. You need to add the package sun.misc to the java platform packages in the etc/jre.properties file.

feature.name: camel-guice
feature.details: camel-guice currently do not work in OSGi

feature.name: camel-hbase
feature.details: The camel-hbase feature is deprecated. It doesn't really work in OSGi and it will be removed in future.

feature.name: camel-hdfs2
feature.details: The camel-hdfs2 feature can only run if you have libsnappyjava.dylib in java.library.path

feature.name: camel-infinispan
feature.details: The camel-infinispan feature requires Java 8

feature.name: camel-jbpm
feature.details: The camel-jbpm feature can only run on a SUN JVM. You need to add the package com.sun.tools.xjc to the java platform packages in the etc/jre.properties file.

feature.name: camel-jetty8
feature.details: camel-jetty8 is deprecated, use camel-jetty9

feature.name: camel-jetty9
feature.details: camel-jetty9 intend to work with jetty9. Camel-jetty9 is the default choice.

feature.name: camel-jetty
feature.details: camel-jetty intend to work with jetty9, so this feature only works in the karaf container which support jetty9, e.g. karaf 4.x

feature.name: camel-jibx
feature.details: camel-jibx does not work with Java 8

feature.name: camel-lucene
feature.details: camel-lucene currently do not work in OSGi

feature.name: camel-optaplanner
feature.details: The camel-optaplanner feature can only run on a SUN JVM. You need to add the package com.sun.tools.xjc to the java platform packages in the etc/jre.properties file.

feature.name: camel-pgevent
feature.details: installing camel-pgevent may output an error in the log but it is installed correctly

feature.name: camel-rx
feature.details: The camel-rx feature can only run on a SUN JVM. You need to add the package sun.misc to the java platform packages in the etc/jre.properties file.

feature.name: camel-spark-rest
feature.details: camel-spark-rest requires Java 8 and Jetty9

feature.name: camel-swagger
feature.details: camel-swagger is deprecated, use camel-swagger-java instead

feature.name: camel-vertx
feature.details: camel-vertx feature requires Java 8

feature.name: camel-xmljson
feature.details: Before using this feature make sure to install this bundle first manually: mvn:xom/xom/1.2.7.redhat-4
